Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Gary Warren
Reviews.Content: Great little camera with lots of bells and whistles.  Easy to operate which is extra nice for those who are beginners.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP CCD Image Sensor - ISO 100 to 12800
3.0" 230k-Dot LCD - Wi-Fi Direct, Email
25-125mm f/2.5 5x Optical Zoom Lens - 2D Panorama, Smart Auto, Smart Movie
Capture HD 720/30p Video - Face, Blink and Smile Detection
Direct LINK, Mobile Link, Remote VF - microSD/microSDHC Memory Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F 16.2MP w/ WiFi Ready Smart Compact Digital Camera in White + Replacement BP-70A Battery + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
